00019 const ConstMap<std::string,int> SVMType = ConstMap<std::string,int>
00020     ("C_SVC",      cv::SVM::C_SVC)
00021     ("NU_SVC",      cv::SVM::NU_SVC)
00022     ("ONE_CLASS", cv::SVM::ONE_CLASS)
00023     ("EPS_SVR",   cv::SVM::EPS_SVR)
00024     ("NU_SVR",    cv::SVM::NU_SVR);

00027 const ConstMap<std::string,int> SVMKernelType = ConstMap<std::string,int>
00028     ("Linear",      cv::SVM::LINEAR)
00029     ("Poly",      cv::SVM::POLY)
00030     ("RBF",       cv::SVM::RBF)
00031     ("Sigmoid",   cv::SVM::SIGMOID);

00034 const ConstMap<int,std::string> InvSVMType = ConstMap<int,std::string>
00035     (cv::SVM::C_SVC,    "C_SVC")
00036     (cv::SVM::NU_SVC,   "NU_SVC")
00037     (cv::SVM::ONE_CLASS,"ONE_CLASS")
00038     (cv::SVM::EPS_SVR,  "EPS_SVR")
00039     (cv::SVM::NU_SVR,   "NU_SVR");

00042 const ConstMap<int,std::string> InvSVMKernelType = ConstMap<int,std::string>
00043     (cv::SVM::LINEAR,   "Linear")
00044     (cv::SVM::POLY,     "Poly")
00045     (cv::SVM::RBF,      "RBF")
00046     (cv::SVM::SIGMOID,  "Sigmoid");

00053 CvSVMParams getParams(    vector<MxArray>::iterator it,
00054                         vector<MxArray>::iterator end)
00055 {
00056     CvSVMParams params;
00057     for (;it<end;it+=2) {
00058         string key((*it).toString());
00059         MxArray& val = *(it+1);
00060         if (key=="SVMType")
00061             params.svm_type = SVMType[val.toString()];
00062         else if (key=="KernelType")
00063             params.kernel_type = SVMKernelType[val.toString()];
00064         else if (key=="Degree")
00065             params.degree = val.toDouble();
00066         else if (key=="Gamma")
00067             params.gamma = val.toDouble();
00068         else if (key=="Coef0")
00069             params.coef0 = val.toDouble();
00070         else if (key=="C")
00071             params.C = val.toDouble();
00072         else if (key=="Nu")
00073             params.nu = val.toDouble();
00074         else if (key=="P")
00075             params.p = val.toDouble();
00076         else if (key=="TermCrit") {
00077             params.term_crit = val.toTermCriteria();
00078         }
00079     }
00080     return params;
00081 }
00082 
00084 const char* cv_svm_params_fields[] = {"svm_type","kernel_type","degree","gamma",
00085     "coef0","C","nu","p","class_weights","term_crit"};
00086 
00091 mxArray* cvSVMParamsToMxArray(const cv::SVMParams& params)
00092 {
00093     mxArray *p = mxCreateStructMatrix(1,1,10,cv_svm_params_fields);
00094     if (!p)
00095         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Allocation error");
00096     mxSetField(const_cast<mxArray*>(p),0,"svm_type",      MxArray(InvSVMType[params.svm_type]));
00097     mxSetField(const_cast<mxArray*>(p),0,"kernel_type",   MxArray(InvSVMKernelType[params.kernel_type]));
00098     mxSetField(const_cast<mxArray*>(p),0,"degree",        MxArray(params.degree));
00099     mxSetField(const_cast<mxArray*>(p),0,"gamma",         MxArray(params.gamma));
00100     mxSetField(const_cast<mxArray*>(p),0,"coef0",         MxArray(params.coef0));
00101     mxSetField(const_cast<mxArray*>(p),0,"C",             MxArray(params.C));
00102     mxSetField(const_cast<mxArray*>(p),0,"nu",            MxArray(params.nu));
00103     mxSetField(const_cast<mxArray*>(p),0,"p",             MxArray(params.p));
00104     mxSetField(const_cast<mxArray*>(p),0,"class_weights", MxArray(params.class_weights));
00105     mxSetField(const_cast<mxArray*>(p),0,"term_crit",     MxArray(params.term_crit));
00106     return p;
00107 }
00108 
00113 CvParamGrid getGrid(MxArray& m)
00114 {
00115     if (m.isNumeric() && m.numel()==3) {
00116         CvParamGrid g(m.at<double>(0),m.at<double>(1),m.at<double>(2));
00117         if (!g.check())
00118             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid argument to grid parameter");
00119         return g;
00120     }
00121     else if (m.isStruct() && m.numel()==1) {
00122         mxArray* pm;
00123         double min_val = (pm=mxGetField(m,0,"min_val")) ? MxArray(pm).toDouble() : 0;
00124         double max_val = (pm=mxGetField(m,0,"max_val")) ? MxArray(pm).toDouble() : 0;
00125         double log_step = (pm=mxGetField(m,0,"log_step")) ? MxArray(pm).toDouble() : 0;
00126         CvParamGrid g(min_val, max_val, log_step);
00127         if (!g.check())
00128             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid argument to grid parameter");
00129         return g;
00130     }
00131     else
00132         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid argument to grid parameter");
00133 }
00134 }
00135 
00143 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00144                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00145 {
00146     if (nlhs>1)
00147         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00148     
00149     // Determine argument format between constructor or (id,method,...)
00150     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00151     int id = 0;
00152     string method;
00153     if (nrhs==0) {
00154         // Constructor is called. Create a new object from argument
00155         obj_[++last_id] = SVM();
00156         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00157         return;
00158     }
00159     else if (rhs[0].isNumeric() && rhs[0].numel()==1 && nrhs>1) {
00160         id = rhs[0].toInt();
00161         method = rhs[1].toString();
00162     }
00163     else
00164         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid arguments");
00165     
00166     // Big operation switch
00167     SVM& obj = obj_[id];
00168     if (method == "delete") {
00169         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs!=0)
00170             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Output not assigned");
00171         obj_.erase(id);
00172     }
00173     else if (method == "clear") {
00174         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs!=0)
00175             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00176         obj.clear();
00177     }
00178     else if (method == "load") {
00179         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs!=0)
00180             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00181         obj.load(rhs[2].toString().c_str());
00182     }
00183     else if (method == "save") {
00184         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs!=0)
00185             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00186         obj.save(rhs[2].toString().c_str());
00187     }
00188     else if (method == "train") {
00189         if (nrhs<4 || nlhs>1)
00190             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00191         Mat trainData(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00192         Mat responses(rhs[3].toMat(CV_32F));
00193         Mat varIdx, sampleIdx;
00194         CvSVMParams params = getParams(rhs.begin()+4,rhs.end());
00195         Mat class_weights;
00196         for (int i=4; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00197             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00198             if (key=="VarIdx")
00199                 varIdx = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32S);
00200             else if (key=="SampleIdx")
00201                 sampleIdx = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32S);
00202             else if (key=="ClassWeights") {
00203                 class_weights = rhs[i+1].toMat();
00204                 CvMat _m = class_weights;
00205                 params.class_weights = &_m;
00206             }
00207         }
00208         bool b = obj.train(trainData,responses,varIdx,sampleIdx,params);
00209         plhs[0] = MxArray(b);
00210     }
00211     else if (method == "predict") {
00212         if (nrhs<3 || nlhs>1)
00213             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00214         Mat samples(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00215         Mat results(samples.rows,1,CV_32FC1);
00216         bool returnDFVal=false;
00217         for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00218             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00219             if (key=="ReturnDFVal")
00220                 returnDFVal = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00221             else
00222                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00223         }
00224         for (int i=0; i<samples.rows; ++i)
00225             results.at<float>(i,0) = obj.predict(samples.row(i));
00226         plhs[0] = MxArray(results);
00227     }
00228     else if (method == "train_auto") {
00229         if (nrhs<4 || nlhs>1)
00230             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00231         Mat trainData(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00232         Mat responses(rhs[3].toMat(CV_32F));
00233         Mat varIdx, sampleIdx;
00234         int k_fold=10;
00235         CvParamGrid Cgrid=CvSVM::get_default_grid(CvSVM::C);
00236         CvParamGrid gammaGrid=CvSVM::get_default_grid(CvSVM::GAMMA);
00237         CvParamGrid pGrid=CvSVM::get_default_grid(CvSVM::P);
00238         CvParamGrid nuGrid=CvSVM::get_default_grid(CvSVM::NU);
00239         CvParamGrid coeffGrid=CvSVM::get_default_grid(CvSVM::COEF);
00240         CvParamGrid degreeGrid=CvSVM::get_default_grid(CvSVM::DEGREE);
00241         bool balanced=false;
00242         for (int i=4; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00243             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00244             if (key=="VarIdx")
00245                 varIdx = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32S);
00246             else if (key=="SampleIdx")
00247                 sampleIdx = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32S);
00248             else if (key=="KFold")
00249                 k_fold = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00250             else if (key=="Balanced")
00251                 balanced = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00252             else if (key=="CGrid")
00253                 Cgrid = getGrid(rhs[i+1]);
00254             else if (key=="GammaGrid")
00255                 gammaGrid = getGrid(rhs[i+1]);
00256             else if (key=="PGrid")
00257                 pGrid = getGrid(rhs[i+1]);
00258             else if (key=="NuGrid")
00259                 nuGrid = getGrid(rhs[i+1]);
00260             else if (key=="CoeffGrid")
00261                 coeffGrid = getGrid(rhs[i+1]);
00262             else if (key=="DegreeGrid")
00263                 degreeGrid = getGrid(rhs[i+1]);
00264         }
00265         CvSVMParams params = getParams(rhs.begin()+4,rhs.end());
00266         bool b = obj.train_auto(trainData,responses,varIdx,sampleIdx,params,
00267             k_fold, Cgrid, gammaGrid, pGrid, nuGrid, coeffGrid, degreeGrid, balanced);
00268         plhs[0] = MxArray(b);
00269     }
00270     else if (method == "get_var_count") {
00271         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs>1)
00272             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00273         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.get_var_count());
00274     }
00275     else if (method == "get_params") {
00276         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs>1)
00277             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00278         CvSVMParams params = obj.get_params();
00279         plhs[0] = MxArray(cvSVMParamsToMxArray(params));
00280     }
00281     else if (method == "get_support_vector_count") {
00282         if (nrhs!=2 || nlhs>1)
00283             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00284         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.get_support_vector_count());
00285     }
00286     else if (method == "get_support_vector") {
00287         if (nrhs!=3 || nlhs>1)
00288             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00289         const float *sv = obj.get_support_vector(rhs[2].toInt());
00290         vector<float> svv(sv,sv+obj.get_var_count());
00291         plhs[0] = MxArray(Mat(svv));
00292     }
00293     else
00294         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized operation");
00295 }
